Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Town (Naukratis), House of 'cache of bronzes'
Curator's comments: This piece was discovered with many other finds- amongst which a large gourp of bronze figures- in a house to the south of the town (Masson 2015, 79, fig. 3.11; Petrie 1886, 41-42). Masson, A. 2015, ‘Cult and Trade. A reflexion on Egyptian metal offerings from Naukratis’, in D. Robinson and F. Goddio (eds), Thonis Heracleion in Context, Oxford Centre for Maritime Archaeology Monograph 8, Oxford, 71-88.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (TI.30)
Masson 2015 / Cult and Trade A reflexion on Egyptian metal offerings from Naukratis (79, fig. 3.11)
